thread.section_title: Harvey Norman Ireland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Harvey Norman Ireland | harveynorman.ie
thread.title: Sarah Mccarthy
thread.title_full: Harvey Norman Ireland reviewed by Sarah Mccarthy

author: Sarah Mccarthy
title: Sarah Mccarthy
text:
I found Michelle in Customer Services to be kind, caring and extremely efficient.
She listened to my query and within a week a new table leg and a new chair replacement was waiting for me at my local warehouse (they even gave me the option of free delivery)
A fantastic experience.
Delighted with the end result and the kind manner in which my query was handled
